entry.title: CODiScan - Aladdin 3.2.4
entry.summary: The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.2.4 is now available.
entry.content:
The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.2.4 is now available.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Aladdin Github page.

Enhancements​

  • Added new intent that can cause a pairing barcode to be displayed.
  • Pairing dialogs no longer come up when run on Datalogic devices with SDK 1.36 or newer.

Corrected Defects​

  • Fixed issue with pairing to being lost on battery swap.
  • Fixed issue with pairing to being lost on reboot.
  • Fixed issue with pairing barcode sometimes being invalid.
  • Fixed issue with connect button sometimes not being displayed.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.3.1
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.3.1 is now available. It includes minor enhancements and a bug fix. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.3.1 is now available. It includes minor enhancements and a bug fix. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancements​

  • Added support for Android 13 versions of Skorpio X5, XLR Skorpio X5, Memor 11, and Memor 20.

Corrected Defects​

  • Fixed bug with application policies that could cause a new policy not to be added.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.3.0
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.3.0 is now available. It includes many new enhancements and a bug fix. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.3.0 is now available. It includes many new enhancements and a bug fix. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancements​

  • Added Routines to the Application Policies section
  • Added pop up menu to the task tray that allows for port configuration
  • Updated icons for Datalogic apps within the Mobility Suite Updates section
  • Updated Memor 35 firmware metadata
  • Added ENABLE_APP and DISABLE_APP to the Scripts page
  • Added key sequences and new BATTSWAP keycode to the Advanced Keyboard
  • Improved layouts of the Visual Formatter

Corrected Defects​

  • Fixed an issue where it was possible to create a tar file with multiple OTA files in it

entry.summary: Updated branding icons for latest Mobility Suite.
entry.content: Updated branding icons for latest Mobility Suite.

entry.summary: Enhancements
entry.content:
Enhancements​

entry.title: OEMConfig 2.7.0
entry.summary: Enhancements
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • Added support for USB whitelisting
  • Added support for DigiMarc label formatting

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Agent 2.3.1
entry.summary: Updated branding icons for latest Mobility Suite.
entry.content: Updated branding icons for latest Mobility Suite.

entry.title: Datalogic SoftSpot 3.0.3
entry.summary: Updated branding icons for latest Mobility Suite.
entry.content: Updated branding icons for latest Mobility Suite.

entry.title: Datalogic WiFi Guard 1.4.0
entry.summary: Enhancements
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • Added support for 6 GHz band
  • Added support for WPA3 profiles

entry.title: Datalogic Enterprise Browser 1.4.2
entry.summary: Enhancements
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • Improved security handling
    • Blocks connections with SSL errors, adding an option to proceed anyway.
    • Allows user to select a certificate when a web server requires a client certificate.
  • Improved clear browser cache management
    • Added option to clear browser cache when the Home button is selected.
    • Prevents access to previous webpage from Favorites screen after clearing the cache.

Corrected Defects​

  • On-screen keyboard no longer covers up web page content.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.2.1
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.2.1 is now available. It includes some bug fixes. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.2.1 is now available. It includes some bug fixes. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Corrected Defects​

  • Added support for new Aladdin package name.
    • Profiles containing the old APK will be modified to include the new version on edit/import
  • Fixed an issue that could prevent the profile from being downloaded if the server port was changed

entry.title: CODiScan - Aladdin 3.1.0
entry.summary: The Aladdin 3.1.0 is now available.
entry.content:
The Aladdin 3.1.0 is now available.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Aladdin Github page. Please note that the package name has been changed to com.datalogic.aladdinapp starting with this version. Users will need to manually uninstall any older versions of the app prior to installing any newer versions.

Features​

Bluetooth Connections​

  • Streamlined pairing process
  • QR codes now used for pairing

Find My Device Feature​

  • Users can now tap a button in the app to cause a connected CODiScan to light up and play tones to assist the user in finding the scanner.

Other features​

  • Application can now be directly configured by an EMM through the Google Play store.
  • Additional battery information (cycle count and health)

entry.title: OEMConfig 2.6.2
entry.summary: Corrected Defects
entry.content:
Corrected Defects​

  • Prevents crashes when used by some EMMs.
  • Corrected behavior of PTT Walkie-Talkie app default value to reset to "None".

entry.title: OEMConfig 2.6.1
entry.summary: Enhancements
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • Added support for Push-To-Talk
  • Added support of eSIM
  • Enhanced support for Bluetooth discovery/pairing
  • Added support of new decoding properties:
    • GTIN format
    • GS1 conversion/transmission
    • GS1 Digital Link
    • TLC39 symbology
  • Added support for battery charging persistence policy
  • Added support for device name properties

Corrected Defects​

  • Corrected charging profile to respect default setting on Memor 30/35 models.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Agent 2.3.0
entry.summary: Enhancements
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • Better coordination with Espresso during Enterprise backup restore.
  • Enhanced timeout for OEMConfig to avoid errors when downloading eSIM profiles.
  • Supports ability to clear any existing application policies

Corrected Defects​

  • Applying WPA3 network profiles when Wi-Fi is disabled can fail.
  • Unable to create an Enterprise backup when deploying from USB storage.

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.2.0
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.2.0 is now available. It includes new enhancements. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.2.0 is now available. It includes new enhancements. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancements​

  • Added Memor 30/30X & 35/35X device selection support
  • Added the ability to configure the ports used by Studio processes
  • Visual Formatter
    • Added feature level 4 support
  • Advanced Keyboard
    • Added support for the Memor 30/30X & 35/35X

entry.title: DLRMUS 1.0.19
entry.summary: Compatibility
entry.content:
Compatibility​

  • Windows 10
  • Debian 6
  • Ubuntu 22

Enhancements​

  • Added support for OEM bulk transfer
  • Added IHS support for PowerScan 9600
  • Added support for .S37 and .DAT file transfer over Service Port
  • Added EC verification over service port
  • Added TopModelNumber checking over service port

Corrected defects​

  • Corrected some model properties for the 1100i
  • Corrected inconsistent log files extensions
  • Corrected issues connecting over Service Port on non-USB interfaces

entry.title: OEMConfig 2.5.1
entry.summary: Enhancements
entry.content:
Enhancements​

  • Added support for enabling charging sources (includes hot fix)
  • Added support for advanced Ethernet properties
  • Updated support for WiFi
    • Updated support for WiFi roaming profile to include Legacy profile
    • Added support for 802.11ac and 802.11ax
    • Added support for 6 GHz bands
    • Added support for scanning stabilization time

entry.title: CODiScan - Aladdin 3.0.5
entry.summary: The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.0.5 is now available. This is the initial version of the Aladdin Mobile Application.
entry.content:
The Aladdin application for CODiScan version 3.0.5 is now available. This is the initial version of the Aladdin Mobile Application.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Aladdin Github page.

Features​

Bluetooth Connections​

  • Easy BT pairing using a barcode.

Handheld Scanner Battery Management​

  • Battery level indication
  • Battery information
  • Battery management profile control

Handheld Scanner Information​

  • Scanner type
  • Firmware version
  • Device ID

Barcode Data Integration​

  • The Aladdin Mobile Application provides four different methods for getting the barcode data from the handheld scanner.
    • Keyboard (data input as keystrokes)
    • Intent (data input as intents to application)
    • WebSocket (data input as web socket events)
    • SDK (interface used by Android apps to get data)

Other Features​

  • Aladdin on-screen keyboard
  • Scanning history

entry.title: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.1.0
entry.summary: Scan2Deploy Studio 2.1.0 is now available. It includes new enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.
entry.content:
Scan2Deploy Studio 2.1.0 is now available. It includes new enhancements and bug fixes. Read below for more details.

Downloads are available in the Releases section on the Scan2Deploy Studio Github page.

Enhancements​

  • Added Aladdin APK support for Memor 11 devices
  • Visual Formatter
    • Added Key Event Number action to enable sending Android keycode events
    • Added new symbologies (GS1 DataMatrix, GS1 QR Code, OCR, ITF-14, Han Xin)

Corrected Defects​

  • Visual Formatter
    • Fixed an issue where managed events and hide output label flags were not loaded correctly from a saved profile
